description: This file defines a layout component for a Qwik-based web application, including imports, a request handler for caching, a route loader for server-side data, and a component that renders header, footer, and slot content.

methods.name: onGet
methods.description: Handles incoming GET requests, sets cache control headers for performance optimization.

methods.name: useServerTimeLoader
methods.description: Loads server-side data, specifically the current date-time in ISO string format.

methods.name: default
methods.description: Main layout component that renders header, footer, and slot content with associated styles.
